93 // -> Pixhawk vehicle odometry pose frame message package definitions
94 inline constexpr uint8_t POSE_FRAME_UNKNOWN = 0; // Pose frame unkown
95 inline constexpr uint8_t POSE_FRAME_NED = 1; // NED earth-fixed frame
96 inline constexpr uint8_t POSE_FRAME_FRD = 2; // FRD world-fixed frame, arbitrary heading reference
